part_4_complete_recipe_collection.title: The Complete Punic Wax Recipe Collection

recipe_a_dew_of_hermon_headcone.name: Traditional 'Dew of Hermon' Headcone Recreation
method: Natural melting provides timed consciousness release

recipe_b_basic_punic_wax.name: Basic Punic Wax (Saponified Beeswax)

ingredients.potash_solution: 100 g potash (K2CO3) dissolved in 0.5 L hot distilled water
ingredients.honey_solution: 0.5 L hot honey/sugar solution (100 g honey or sugar + water)

instructions: Melt beeswax in large pot (minimum 10 L capacity)
Slowly add dissolved potash solution while stirring
Add hot honey/sugar solution while stirring
Gradually add cold water during continuous stirring
Heat briefly, cover, cool while stirring occasionally
Store in airtight containers (keeps 2-3 years cool)

recipe_c_seawater_method.name: Seawater Saponification Method (Pliny's Ancient Formula)

ingredients.artificial_seawater: 42 g sodium chloride + 30 g sodium bicarbonate in 1200 mL water

instructions: Boil wax repeatedly in seawater solution
Separate white waxy mass from surface
Cool and repeat process multiple times
Final product: Hard, brittle wax melting at 73-75C

recipe_d_potash_lye_pour.name: Potash Lye Pour Method - The Consciousness Activation Process
instructions: Create potash lye water (potassium carbonate solution)
Pour small amounts of lye water onto melted wax
Process creates saponification through repeated interface
Cool while stirring to prevent separation
recipe_d_potash_lye_pour.safety: Stainless steel only, rubber gloves, vinegar for neutralization

recipe_e_punic_milk.name: Punic Milk (Fire-Resistant Coating)

ingredients: 1/8 L distilled water with 1 tablespoon honey/sugar
1/4 L liquid borax-casein (sodium tetraborate + milk proteins)

recipe_e_punic_milk.applications: Fire protection paints, wood consolidation, non-combustible building materials

recipe_f_egyptian_magic.name: Egyptian Magic Skin Cream (Dr. Imas Formula)
method: Add olive oil slowly while stirring
Remove from heat, add bee pollen and royal jelly

recipe_g_kyphi.name: Kyphi (Sacred Temple Incense)
preparation: Burn in evenings for consciousness/dreamwork preparation

ethiopian_horn.name: Frankincense
ethiopian_horn.source: Boswellia sacra, B. frereana, B. serrata, B. papyrifera
ethiopian_horn.benefits: Ancient temple use, spiritual conductor, hardening agent

application_guidelines.heat_resistance: Damar, Frankincense, Pine resins (10-25% by weight, raises melting point to 180-220F)
application_guidelines.hardening: Mastic, Copal, Amber (5-15% by weight, reduced brittleness)
application_guidelines.pigmentation: Sangre de Drago (red), Breu Branco (white), Breu Preto (black), Amber (golden)
